Title: ...And the Woman Clothed in Sun
Writer: Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Thomas Harris (characters from the book "Red Dragon"), Don Mancini, Bryan Fuller
Actors: Hugh Dancy, Mads Mikkelsen, Caroline Dhavernas, Gillian Anderson
Plot: Carvings symbolizing the Great Red Dragon are retrieved from crime scenes, casting light on Francis Dolarhyde's warped psyche. Meanwhile, both Dolarhyde and Will seek the wisdom of Hannibal Lecter.
